availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer. Ohio native. Son of Andrew Stull and Elizabeth Straight Stull. Student in Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Campbell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, District 2, p. 116B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, p. 912.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, Elk Fork Precinct, p. 436A.
